home.description: I am a young Engineer with a passion for programming. Since I was a kid I've been obsessed with solving problems, and code development allows me to fulfill my dream of unleashing my creativity to put a solution to any problem in the world, while making people's lives easier.
home.quote: Build the simplest code, solve the most complex problems

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Graduated in 2021 in Software Engineering at the University of Oviedo, at the Higher Technical School of Computer Engineering.

languages.title: Languages
languages.subtitle: Advanced level of speaking, reading and writing in English and native in Spanish.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: I have been working on different projects since before finishing my university degree. I currently work at Idealista.com, the most important company in Spain, Portugal and Italy in its sector.

skills.header: I have experience in the following fields of knowledge.

front.title: Front-End Development
front.subtitle: HTML and CSS, as well as frameworks like Bootstrap or Materialize.

back.title: Back-End Development
back.subtitle: Java, PHP, JavaScript, C#, C++, Python, and TypeScript, as well as technologies like Angular, NodeJS, Phalcon, Symfony, SpringBoot, and React, among others.

api.title: API Management
api.subtitle: Knowledge of creating, managing and maintaining APIs.

database.title: Database Management
database.subtitle: SQL, MySQL, PL-SQL, MongoDB, MariaDB, NoSQL and Oracle. Extensive knowledge in both relational and documentary databases.

business.title: Business Management
business.subtitle: Extensive knowledge in Design Patterns and Software Design, as well as advanced concepts of Software Architecture and principles of security and data consistency.

tester.title: Tester
tester.subtitle: Advanced testing knowledge (JUnit, Selenium and PHPUnit, among others)

projects.header: Here's a list of my previous projects.

realestate.title: Real Estate Application
realestate.subtitle: Made with NodeJS, this application allows the user to manage all the aspects related with renting or buying properties, as well as handling everything related with communications, documents or media.

runner.title: Game Runner
runner.subtitle: This game was is an experiment to try to create a pure JavaScript game application.

shooter.title: Game Shooter
shooter.subtitle: This shooter videogame is created in Unreal Engine 4 and allows the user to survive different rounds against different threats. In order to defent himself, he can use different guns or powerups.

music.title: Music Shop Application
music.subtitle: A simple music shop application made in SpringBoot. It allows the user to buy, sell or play different music tracks.

contact-me.header: I will be happy to answer any questions you have.
